projects.title: ConnectMe - Chatting Application
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to send texts, images and emojies in real time.
 - End to End encryption using **AES** Algorithm.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - Automated APK generation process using Jenkins and AWS EC2 Server

projects.title: Instagram Bot
projects.bodyText:
- Built Python BOT for fast downloads, efficient editing, automated login/uploads, and multitasking with multiple reels
 -  Utilized moviepy to enhance downloaded reels, Slashing editing time by 40%..
 - Employed Selenium to automate login and reel uploads with a 95% success rate

projects.title: Automated Testing Framework
projects.bodyText:
- Created Automated Testing Framework with Shell Script, Docker, Robot Framework, Jenkins for reliable local testing.
 - Developed and executed test cases in Robot Framework.
 - Integrated the testing framework into Jenkins.
 - Demonstrated expertise in scripting, automation, and CI/CD pipeline integration

projects.title: Multi-tier Web Application
projects.bodyText:
- Orchestrated multiple services (Fluentd, Nginx, Flask App, Elasticsearch, Kibana) using Docker Compose for seamless integration.
 - Implemented centralized logging using Fluentd, with service-specific logging drivers for Nginx and Flask App.
 - Deployed Elasticsearch and Kibana, ensuring reliability with health checks and secure communication via Docker Compose networks.
